About.title: About Me
About.description: Hi! I'm Luccas, a passionate Full-Stack developer who loves building innovative and efficient solutions. With experience in both front-end and back-end development, I enjoy creating applications that deliver great user experiences and meet business needs.

Tech.title: My Technologies
Tech.description: okLorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Consectetur inventore vero culpa ullam ipsum odit.

tech-stacks.react-dec: A declarative and efficient JavaScript library used to build modern user interfaces, especially single-page applications (SPAs).
tech-stacks.next-dec: A React-based framework that provides hybrid rendering (SSR/SSG), automatic routing, and outstanding performance for scalable web applications.
tech-stacks.tailwind-dec: A utility-first CSS framework that allows developers to build responsive and modern layouts directly using classes within HTML.
tech-stacks.node-dec: A server-side JavaScript runtime environment that enables the creation of APIs, backend systems, and CLI tools with high performance.
tech-stacks.express-dec: A minimalist and flexible Node.js framework used to build APIs and web applications quickly and efficiently.
tech-stacks.type-dec: A statically typed superset of JavaScript that helps catch errors early and improves application maintainability.
tech-stacks.prisma-dec: A modern ORM for Node.js and TypeScript that simplifies access and manipulation of relational databases with type safety.
tech-stacks.mysql-dec: A widely used relational database management system known for its performance, reliability, and ease of use.
tech-stacks.java-dec: A robust, object-oriented, and cross-platform programming language commonly used in enterprise applications and Android development.
tech-stacks.python-dec: A versatile, simple, and powerful programming language widely used for automation, data analysis, web development, and artificial intelligence.

Projects.title: Explore My Projects
Projects.description: Discover some of the projects I've developed. Each one was created with a lot of learning and passion.

Project1.title: Weather Checker
Project1.description: An app that queries the OpenWeather API and displays weather forecasts for any city in the world.

Project2.title: Password Manager
Project2.description: Generate secure and customized passwords with different complexity criteria.

Project3.title: Base Converter
Project3.description: Easily convert numbers between different numerical systems.

Project4.title: Portfolio
Project4.description: This portfolio was built using React and Tailwind CSS, showcasing my skills and projects.

Project5.title: Bookboxd
Project5.description: Search for books easily and view technical details.
